Surcharge.name: Surcharge
Surcharge.description: Represents the details about a surcharge calculation.

Amount.description: The surcharge as a flat amount.

CalculationType.description: The type of calculation or process used to determine the surcharge.

EffectiveFromDate.description: The date when the surcharge becomes active.

EffectiveToDate.description: The date when the surcharge becomes inactive.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the surcharge is active (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

ProcedureId.description: The name of the expression set or integration procedure that's used to calculate the surcharge.

Rate.description: The surcharge amount as a percentage.
